author: timbeiko
content: I was OOO and those are my PRs - both now merged ‚úÖ

author: timbeiko
content:
Also, we're scheduled for a testing call today. It was on the Protocols Calendar, but didn't have an agenda up. Just put one together quickly: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/935

See you in ~80 minutes!

Zoom: https://ethereumfoundation.zoom.us/j/88332629239?pwd=YmNpVVpaVy93RXhOTS9DYmNtWGtLdz09
Stream: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JSnJo8T16Z4

author: timbeiko
content:
A few things that came up on the call:
- ETA for the Goerli blog post is Wed ~15 UTC, seems like almost all client teams should have a release by then. Only team we still haven't confirmed is <@&595681804422479873>. 
- We're planning a last, small, Goerli shadow fork next Monday with all the final client releases. 
- On the CL side, we want to discuss https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/issues/3466 further, we'll add it to the ACDC agenda
- On the EL side, it would be nice to finalize exposing the blob gas price in the APIs by next ACDE. A PR is open here: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/486

author: arnetheduck
content: Goerli release out since last Thursday, but it got hotfixed today, v24.1.1 for Nimbus!
